paper_abstract: The Makeham distribution has been used to describe human mortality and establish actuarial tables. The hazard function is defined by mu(t) = A + BCt we use the least squares type estimation to estimate the parameters of Makeham distribution in this paper. Seven cases are considered, when A, B, C are known or unknown, respectively. Also, we evaluated the mean square errors of these estimators. (c) 2007 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Estimation of parameters of the Makeham distribution using the least squares method
